title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
content: Greetings everyone, I hope you're all doing well! Today I have up for auction something very special!This is the first CoolStorage.org canvas ever offered, a design concept I came up with in 2019.I plan on releasing a small numbered run of 16x20 canvas prints, this auction is to help fund that.The concept of the piece: "THE TIMES TRAVELER"In the future the secret of time travel is discovered. A time traveler goes back in time and convincesThe Times to run an alternate front page article on Jan. 3rd 2009 after revealing to them the bitcoin whitepaper,source code and genesis block code that embeds the famous "Chancellor on brink of second bailout" headlinethat had yet to be printed! Replacing the Israel sends troops into Gaza headline with the message from averified time traveler that bitcoin would become the future world currency, right above the bank bailout headline!This changes history forever, as on the same day Satoshi launched the bitcoin blockchain, the entire civilizedworld would now learn of bitcoin's existence and destiny as the future world currency.Pretty elaborate setup eh, heheh maybe I can sell the movie rights?!?!  "THE TIMES TRAVELER"PROTOTYPE 1.5" Gallery wrapped 16"x20" CanvasCaption below photo: "Today will go down in history as the day a verified time travelerrevealed that bitcoin will in the near future become the #1 trusted worldwide currency."Starting bid: 0.001BTCBid Increments: 0.0001BTCEnd date and time:  Thursday, June 30th. 2022 at 4pm EST. Countdown TimerShipping: Actual cost paid by winner. Any Import/VAT taxes are to be paid by winner.Sniping: Any bid made within the last 5 minutes of the auctionwill extend the auction 5 minutes, any additional bid within thatextended time shall further extend the auction 5 additional minutes.Excluded from Bidding: I may exclude any bidder at my sole discretion. Payment: Will PM winner with payment detailsThank You & Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: krogoth on June 24, 2022, 04:11:42 PMCool ..  0.0012BTCThanks buddy!  Quote from: xSlyy on June 24, 2022, 06:28:37 PM0.0013BTCCurrent high bid! Thanks!

comments.author: ZipReg

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: ragilab on June 28, 2022, 06:33:34 PM0.002 BTCCurrent high bid!This auction ends tomorrow.  I neglected to mention in OP that those who have placed a bid in this auction shall have first selection of the available limited edition numbered pieces.I will notify bidders of a future date and time, in advance, so everyone will have a fair chance to reserve number preferences, if so desired.Thanks again for the support everyone!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: MrCryptHodl on June 29, 2022, 04:47:49 PM0.003 BTC  Current high bid!Hey buddy!  Thank you, Sir!Less than 24 Hrs remaining  Thanks again everyone!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Ends in less than 4 hours!  Thanks again everyone! Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: xSlyy on June 30, 2022, 06:31:17 PM0.004Current winning bid!Thank you everyone for the support, it is greatly appreciated!Ends in less than 30 Min!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: xSlyy on June 30, 2022, 06:31:17 PM0.004Winner! Congrats buddy  I will reach out to you shortly!Thanks again everyone!
